metadata.description: New WEFE indicators derived from KPI set, each linked to one or more KPIs
notes: All indicators include kpi_ids linking them to KPI objects in data/kpi.json
Units and bounds aligned with KPI normalization bounds

kpi_indicators.description: Water indicators directly supporting KPI calculations

IND_W_WW_TREATED_SHARE.name: Share of Wastewater Treated
IND_W_WW_TREATED_SHARE.short_description: Percent of generated wastewater that is treated

IND_W_MAR_RECHARGE_VOL.name: MAR Recharge Volume
IND_W_MAR_RECHARGE_VOL.short_description: Water volume recharged via managed aquifer recharge

IND_W_GW_LEVEL_RISE.name: Groundwater Level Rise
IND_W_GW_LEVEL_RISE.short_description: Rise in groundwater level attributable to MAR

IND_W_WW_TO_AD_VOL.name: Wastewater to Anaerobic Digestion
IND_W_WW_TO_AD_VOL.short_description: Volume of wastewater fed to AD

kpi_indicators.description: Energy indicators directly supporting KPI calculations

IND_E_PUMPING_ENERGY_SAVED.name: Pumping Energy Saved
IND_E_PUMPING_ENERGY_SAVED.short_description: Energy saved due to groundwater level rise

IND_E_SPECIFIC_ENERGY_SAVED_PER_HEAD.name: Specific Energy Saved per Unit Head Recovery
IND_E_SPECIFIC_ENERGY_SAVED_PER_HEAD.short_description: Energy saved per mÂ³ per meter of head
IND_E_SPECIFIC_ENERGY_SAVED_PER_HEAD.unit: kilowatt hours per cubic meter per meter

IND_E_BIOGAS_FROM_WW_ENERGY.name: Biogas Energy from Wastewater
IND_E_BIOGAS_FROM_WW_ENERGY.short_description: Energy generated from AD of wastewater

IND_E_BIOGAS_FROM_ORG_WASTE_ENERGY.name: Biogas Energy from Organic Waste
IND_E_BIOGAS_FROM_ORG_WASTE_ENERGY.short_description: Energy generated from AD of organic waste

IND_E_CW_ENERGY_INTENSITY.name: Constructed Wetlands Energy Intensity
IND_E_CW_ENERGY_INTENSITY.short_description: O&M energy intensity of constructed wetlands

kpi_indicators.description: Food/agriculture indicators directly supporting KPI calculations

IND_F_TWW_IRRIGATION_VOL.name: Treated Wastewater to Irrigation
IND_F_TWW_IRRIGATION_VOL.short_description: Volume of treated wastewater applied to agriculture

IND_F_TWW_IRRIGATION_SHARE.name: Share of Irrigation Met by TWW
IND_F_TWW_IRRIGATION_SHARE.short_description: Percent of irrigation demand met by treated wastewater

IND_F_ORG_WASTE_DIVERTED_SHARE.name: Share of Organic Waste Diverted to AD
IND_F_ORG_WASTE_DIVERTED_SHARE.short_description: Percent of organic waste diverted from disposal to AD

IND_F_ORG_WASTE_CODIGEST_MASS.name: Organic Waste Co-digested
IND_F_ORG_WASTE_CODIGEST_MASS.short_description: Mass of organic waste co-digested with sewage/septage

IND_F_DIGESTATE_APPLIED_MASS.name: Digestate Applied to Fields
IND_F_DIGESTATE_APPLIED_MASS.short_description: Quantity of digestate/compost applied to farmland

IND_F_NUTRIENT_VALUE_APPLIED.name: Nutrient Value Applied
IND_F_NUTRIENT_VALUE_APPLIED.short_description: Total nutrient value (N+P+K) applied from digestate

IND_F_CW_IRRIGATION_VOL.name: Constructed Wetlands Irrigation Volume
IND_F_CW_IRRIGATION_VOL.short_description: Volume of CW-treated water used for irrigation
